title: Spten Dental Care
detail: From preventive care to cosmetic and restorative dentistry, we offer various treatments for all ages. Some of the dentistry services (cleanings, fillings, veneers, teeth whitening, crowns, etc.)State-of-the-art technology and modern treatments.

title: JAJ Shop
detail: It is a recondition car buying website. Developed and managed a user-friendly website to showcase used car inventory, promotions, and financing options. Optimized online listings with high-quality images, detailed descriptions, and competitive pricing to attract potential buyers.

title: RR Travelly
detail: Interactive Travel Itineraries- Personalized trip planning with destination guides, maps, and suggested activities. Hotel Booking- Search, compare, and book hotels, and vacation packages with real-time availability. Verified customer feedback on hotels, attractions, and travel services.

title: Doctor Portal
detail: It is a doctor's chamber website. Patients get appointments by the date. Patients and doctors can log in to this website using Google or an email password. A Patient shows all the service and booking an appointment.Doctor can see all appointments of date booked by patient, show all patients and add a doctor.

title: Panda Website
detail: It is an product selling website. User can buy a product and see only his order. User-Friendly Interface- Intuitive navigation, responsive design, and seamless browsing experience across devices. Product Catalog- Well-organized product categories and filtering options for easy discovery.

title: Ema John
detail: User-Friendly Interface- Intuitive navigation, responsive design, and seamless browsing experience across devices. Secure Payment Gateway- Multiple payment methods with encryption and fraud protection. Shopping Cart & Checkout Process- Smooth, one-page checkout with guest checkout and order summary.

title: IT-SOC Desk Plus
detail: Service owner management inventory. Password & incident notification system. Bulk (Promotional & Govt.) SMS management system. Change Request to modify or add features to software project. Incident RCA collect.

title: Production Automation
detail: It's a bpo system application. Client & Employee profile system. Operation & support system. Production process, Designer & QC system. Client-wise invoice generation & summary report. Designer Wise Completed Job calculate.

title: Education Management System
detail: Comprehensive Student Information System. Efficient Faculty & Staff Management. Seamless Course & Exam Management. Registration process integrate. Result management system.
